pageDescription: Manage your menu categories and items

emptyStates.noStoresDescription: Create a store first before adding menu items.
emptyStates.selectStoreDescription: Choose which store's menu you want to manage.
emptyStates.noCategoriesDescription: Create your first menu category to organize your items.
emptyStates.noOptionGroupsDescription: Create option groups for customizations like sizes, toppings, or extras.
emptyStates.noChoices: No choices added yet. Add your first choice below.
emptyStates.noItemsInCategory: No items in this category yet

dialogs.deleteCategoryDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this category? All items in this category will also be deleted. This action cannot be undone.
dialogs.createOptionGroupDescription: Create a new option group with choices.
dialogs.updateOptionGroupDescription: Update the option group details and choices.
dialogs.deleteOptionGroupDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this option group? All choices in this group will also be deleted. This action cannot be undone.
dialogs.deleteItemDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this item? This action cannot be undone.

descriptions.itemDetailsCard: Basic information about this menu item.
descriptions.allergensCard: Select all allergens present in this item.
descriptions.optionsCard: Attach option groups to this item (e.g., size, toppings, extras).
descriptions.requiredField: Customers must select from this group

placeholders.optionGroupDescription: Optional description for this option group

hints.numFreeOptions: Number of choices customers can add for free before being charged
hints.aggregateMinQuantity: Minimum total quantity customer must select
hints.aggregateMaxQuantity: Maximum total quantity customer can select
hints.defaultSelected: This option will be pre-selected by default when customers view the option group

optionTypes.singleSelectDesc: Customer must choose exactly one option (radio buttons)
optionTypes.quantitySelectDesc: Customer picks quantities of each option (e.g., pick 3 donuts)

pageHeaders.optionGroupsDescription: Manage option groups for item customizations
pageHeaders.addOptionGroupDescription: Create a new option group with choices

messages.needCategoryFirst: You need to create a category first before adding items.

cards.selectCategoryDescription: Choose which category this item belongs to.
cards.addFirstItem: Add your first menu item to this category.

optionGroups.noOptionGroupsYet: No option groups yet. Create some in the Options tab.

masterDetail.selectCategoryDescription: Select a category from the list to view details and manage items.
masterDetail.selectItemDescription: Select an item from the list to view details and edit.
masterDetail.selectOptionGroupDescription: Select an option group from the list to view details and manage choices.

descriptions.upload: Upload a file containing your menu data. We support Excel, CSV, JSON, Markdown, and text files.
descriptions.processing: We're extracting and analyzing your menu data. This may take a minute.
descriptions.review: Review the extracted menu data and select which items to import.

status.pleaseWait: Please wait while we process your menu data.

progress.reviewReady: Your menu is ready for review.

errors.fileTooLarge: File is too large. Maximum size is 10MB.

dropzone.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop your file here, or click to browse
dropzone.supportedFormats: Supported: Excel (.xlsx), CSV, JSON, Markdown, Text
